titles: A proclamation for the encouraging of planters in His Majesties island of Jamaica in the West-Indies
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehal, this fourteenth day of December, in the thirteenth year of our reign.
keywords: Jamaica --  Colonization --  Government policy --  Early works to 1800.
